title: Ricky Martin and hubby Jwan Yosef welcome fourth baby
text:
Cape Town – It's Martin-Yosef party of six!

Ricky Martin took to Instagram on Monday to share the news that him and hubby Jwan Yosef welcomed their fourth child, though they didn't specify exactly when. "Nuestro hijo Renn Martin-Yosef ha nacido," the Livin' la Vida Loca singer wrote, which translates to "Our son Renn Martin-Yosef was born."

SEE THE POST HERE:

The news came shortly after the 47-year-old shared that they were expecting.

In September, accepting the HRC Visibility Award for his advocacy of LGBTQ rights as well as his philanthropic efforts, he said at the 23rd annual Human Rights Campaign National Dinner, "By the way, I have to announce that we are pregnant," before adorably putting his hand over his mouth, giggling, as the audience erupted in cheers.

Ricky married Jwan in 2017, and the couple has three beautiful babies together – twins Mateo and Valentino and baby girl, Lucia.

Congratulations to the happy family!

(Photo: Getty Images)
